title: Hair - Toxic and essential elements
purpose: To measure the concentration of various toxic and essential elements in the hair sample
assessmentSummary: Higher than normal levels of certain toxic elements were detected, which may indicate exposure to environmental toxins.
gptInterpretation: The presence of elevated toxic elements such as arsenic, lead, and cadmium suggests potential environmental exposure that may require further investigation and intervention.
